00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_SCALEBIAS_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_SCALEBIAS_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class ScaleBiasElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mElement;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mElementPtr;
00039                         Real mScale, mBias;
00040 
00041                 public:
00042                         ScaleBiasElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID element, Real scale, Real bias) : mElement(element), mScale(scale), mBias(bias)
00043                         {
00044                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement(mElement);
00045                         }
00046                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00047                         {
00048                                 Real value;
00049                                 value = getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, x, cache);
00050                                 return value * mScale + mBias;
00051                         }
00052         };
00053

00060 
00061                 public:

00065                         }

00097         class ScaleBiasModule : public Module
00098         {
00099                 private:
00100                         Real mScale, mBias;
00101 
00102                 public:
00104                         ScaleBiasModule() : Module(1), mScale(1.0), mBias(0.0)
00105                         {
00106                         }
00108                         void setScale (Real v)
00109                         {
00110                                 mScale = v;
00111                         }
00113                         Real getScale () const
00114                         {
00115                                 return mScale;
00116                         }
00118                         void setBias (Real v)
00119                         {
00120                                 mBias = v;
00121                         }
00123                         Real getBias () const
00124                         {
00125                                 return mBias;
00126                         }
00128                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00129                         {
00130                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00131                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00132                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScaleBiasElement1D(pipe, first, mScale, mBias));
00133                         }
00135                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00136                         {
00137                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00138                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00139                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScaleBiasElement2D(pipe, first, mScale, mBias));
00140                         }
00142                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00143                         {
00144                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00145                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00146                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ScaleBiasElement3D(pipe, first, mScale, mBias));
00147                         }
00149                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_SCALEBIAS; }
00150 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00152                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00154                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00155 #endif
00156         };
